en.table_tilte:
Number of health facilities
 per 10,000 people
en.right: All rights reserved to Ayiti Analytics
en.purpose: This tool exists to provide reliable information on health care services in Haiti, focusing specifically on the number and distribution of health facilities and health care resources in the country. The data can be disaggregated by facility type, district, and, where data are available, by relevant socioeconomic factors.
en.purpose1: The health systems dashboard generates reliable information on:
en.purpose1_1: The number of health facilities (countrywide and by administrative districts)
en.purpose1_2: The number of hospital beds available
en.purpose1_3: The number of full-time health care workers
en.definition: In the tool, you’ll also find Health Care Facilities that we have categorized by
en.definition3: You will also find resource availability relative to the population:
en.definition3_1: Number of health facilities per 10,000 people
en.definition3_2: Number of in-patient beds available per 10,000 people
en.definitions3_3: Number of core health workers available per 10,000 people
en.datasource:
Facility data are reported from the 2017-2018 Service Provision Assessment (SPA) survey in Haiti, a nationally representative survey of health facilities developed by USAID
 and implemented in partnership with the Institut Haïtien de l’Enfance (IHE) and the Ministère de la Santé Publique et de la Population (MSPP). Socioeconomic and demographic data are from 
the Demographic and Health Survey 2016-2017 (Enquête Mortalité, Morbidité et Utilisation des Services (EMMUS-VI) 2016-2017). Population data are from the most recent census and 2018 
population projections from the Haitian Institute of Statistics (Institut Haïtien de Statistique et d'Informatique).
en.DataStrengthsandLimitations: The Demographic and Health Survey interviewers are trained to collect the most accurate data as possible. However, difficulties in identifying facilities that are not registered can result in undercounting.
en.reference_text: Institut Haïtien de l’Enfance IHE and ICF. 2019. Évaluation de la Prestation des Services de Soins de Santé, Haïti, 2017-2018. Rockville, Maryland, USA : IHE and ICF. (Link) Institut Haïtien de l’Enfance  IHE and ICF. 2018. Enquête Mortalité, Morbidité et Utilisation des Services - EMMUS-VI 2016-2017 Pétion-Ville, Haïti, et Rockville, Maryland, USA : IHE et ICF. (Link) Institut Haïtien de Statistique et d’Informatique (IHSI). Projections de la population Haitienne 2018. (Link)

kr.table_tilte: Tablo dansite sant sante pou 10 000 moun
kr.purpose: Ayiti Analytics devlope Zouti sila nan objektif pou jwenn bon jan enfòmasyon sou sèvis laswenyaj. Li pèmèt nou konnen konbyen sant sante kap bay popilasyon an sèvis laswenyaj nan tout komin ak depatman nan peyi Ayiti. Li mete aklè tout resous laswenyaj ou ka jwenn nan tout komin ak depatman peyi a. Li montre konbyen sant sante ou ka jwenn pa komin ou pa depatman ak tout lòt resous ki mache avèk domenn laswenyaj ak faktè ekonomik ki pètinan ki eksplike infòmasyon sila.
kr.purpose1: Zouti sila pèmèt nou jwenn pou yon popilasyon kap viv nan yon lokalite (komin oswa depatman)
kr.purpose1_1: Gwosè ak kantite sant sante ki genyen
kr.purpose1_3: Kantite pwofesyonel sante pou 10 000 moun nan lokalite yo
kr.definition: In the tool, you’ll also find Health Care Facilities that we have categorized by
kr.definition1: Sant sante ki bay laswenyaj yo divize an :
kr.definition3: Avèk tout infòmasyon sila yo nou kakile kijan sant sante sila yo epapiye e konbyen moun sant yo desèvi nan komin oubyen depatman yo tankou:
kr.definition3_1: Kantite sant sante pou 10 000 moun nan lokalite yo
kr.definition3_2: Kantite kabann pou 10 000 moun nan lokalite yo
kr.definition3_3: Kantite pwofesyonel sante pou 10 000 moun nan lokalite yo
kr.datasource: Sous done sa yo repòte nan resansman nan ane 2017-18 SPA ki se Service Provision Assessment an'n Ayiti, yon resansman nasyonal sou enstalasyon la sante devlope pa USAID e ki reyalize nan patenarya ak enstiti ayisyen pou timoun IHE, Ministè Sante Piblik ak Popilas MSPP. Done sosyo-ekonomik ak demografik yo soti nan resansman sou la sante nan ane 2016/17(Ankèt mòtalitè, mòbidite ak itilizasyon sèvis (EMMUS-VI)). Done sou popilasyon an soti nan resansman ki pi resan ak pwojeksyon sou popilasyon ke enstiti estatistik ayisyen te fè (IHSI).
kr.limitations: Institut Haïtien de l’Enfance IHE and ICF. 2019. Évaluation de la Prestation des Services de Soins de Santé, Haïti, 2017-2018.(Link) Institut Haïtien de l’Enfance IHE and ICF. 2018. Enquête Mortalité, Morbidité et Utilisation des Services - EMMUS-VI 2016-2017. (Link) Institut Haïtien de Statistique et d’Informatique (IHSI). Projections de la population Haitienne 2018. (Link)
kr.reference_text: Institut Haïtien de l’Enfance IHE and ICF. 2019 Évaluation de la Prestation des Services de Soins de Santé, Haïti, 2017-2018. Rockville, Maryland, USA : IHE and ICF. (Link) Institut Haïtien de l’Enfance  IHE and ICF. 2018. Enquête Mortalité, Morbidité et Utilisation des Services - EMMUS-VI 2016-2017 Pétion-Ville, Haïti, et Rockville, Maryland, USA : IHE et ICF. (Link) Institut Haïtien de Statistique et d’Informatique (IHSI). Projections de la population Haitienne 2018. (Link)
